text:
I found the issue. For whatever reason XLS has formatted one of my hs_id's as a string, with comma formatting. Changing the column to numbers + 0 decimal places and no separators seems to have done the trick.

Also, the CSV export seems to be working for me again. A week or so ago it keep timing out on me (my table is quite large).

The CSV once imported works fine as Excel resists the to get clever with it.
